about_the_game:
Discover the ultimate challenge in hidden object gaming with HiddenSet! In this game, your mission is to find hidden color combinations to recreate the original design on a cube. In advanced mode, these combinations can be rotated at various angles, adding to the complexity.

The game features a dynamic rewards system with both positive and negative bonuses:
  • Positive Bonuses: reveal hidden elements, group colors, extend time, gain extra lives, and boost your score.
  • Negative Bonuses: hide elements, reduce time, life count, and score.
Time is limited for both finding hidden color combinations and collecting positive bonuses. Additionally, the cube's colored elements may shuffle automatically over time, keeping you on your toes.

Customize your gameplay by adjusting the difficulty level and the cube's size. The larger the cube, the tougher the challenge!

Ready for a real test of your hidden object game skills? Dive into HiddenSet now and see if you have what it takes to master the color cube!

Time is limited for both finding hidden color combinations and collecting positive bonuses. Additionally, the cube's colored elements may shuffle automatically over time, keeping you on your toes.

Customize your gameplay by adjusting the difficulty level and the cube's size. The larger the cube, the tougher the challenge!

name: HiddenSet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz with 4 logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz with 4+ logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 2Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;

short_description: Uncover hidden color combinations to recreate the original cube design. In advanced mode, combinations rotate at various angles. Enjoy dynamic bonuses and customizable difficulty for endless fun!
